snippet: Danny Welbeck scored twice to give England a respite from criticism and a 2-0 win at Switzerland in a European Championship qualifying opener.
abstract: Danny Welbeck scores twice to give England a respite from criticism and a 2-0 win at Switzerland in soccer's European Championship qualifying opener.
lead_paragraph: Danny Welbeck scored twice to give England a respite from criticism and a 2-0 win at Switzerland in a European Championship qualifying opener.

headline.main: Danny Welbeck Powers England in Qualifier
